subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Not a single player at this World Cup has tested positive for a performance-enhancing drug, a sign that FIFA is closing its eyes and pretending that doping in soccer does not exist.
snippet: Not a single player at this World Cup has tested positive for a performance-enhancing drug, a sign that FIFA is closing its eyes and pretending that doping in soccer does not exist.
